title: Zscaler Internet Access - DNS
description: This dashboard provides visibility into DNS traffic as logged by Zscaler Internet Access (ZIA).

definition.content:
[Zscaler Internet Access](https://www.zscaler.com/products-and-solutions/zscaler-internet-access) (ZIA) is a secure Internet and web gateway delivered as a service from the cloud.

This dashboard provides detailed visibility into DNS traffic and security events monitored through Zscaler Internet Access. It enables security and network operations teams to analyze DNS resolution patterns, detect tunneling activity, and enforce DNS policies.

For more information, see the [Zscaler Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/z-scaler/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Top DNS Tunnel & Network App Categories
User Information and Zscaler Client Connector Device Information
